Joshua or Josue__19.1: And the second lot came forth for the children of Simeon by their kindreds: and their inheritance was
Joshua or Josue__19.2: In the midst of the possession of the children of Juda: Bersabee and Sabee and Molada,
Joshua or Josue__19.5: And Siceleg and Bethmarchaboth and Hasersusa,
Joshua or Josue__19.6: And Bethlebaoth and Sarohen: thirteen cities, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.7: Ain and Remmon and Athor and Asan: four cities, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.8: And all the villages round about these cities to Baalath Beer Ramath to the south quarter. This is the inheritance of the children of Simeon according to their kindreds,
Joshua or Josue__19.9: In the possession and lot of the children of Juda: because it was too great, and therefore the children of Simeon had their possession in the midst of their inheritance.
Joshua or Josue__19.10: And the third lot fell to the children of Zabulon by their kindreds: and the border of their possession was unto Sarid.
Joshua or Josue__19.11: And it went up from the sea and from Merala, and came to Debbaseth: as far as the torrent, which is over against Jeconam.
Joshua or Josue__19.12: And it returneth from Sarid eastward to the borders of Ceseleththabor: and it goeth out to Dabereth, and ascendeth towards Japhie.
Joshua or Josue__19.13: And it passeth along from thence to the east side of Gethhepher and Thacasin: and goeth out to Remmon, Amthar and Noa.
Joshua or Josue__19.14: And it turneth about to the north of Hanathon: and the outgoings thereof are the valley of Jephtahel,
Joshua or Josue__19.15: And Cateth and Naalol and Semeron and Jedala and Bethlehem: twelve cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.16: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Zabulon by their kindreds, the cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.17: The fourth lot came out to Issachar by their kindreds.
Joshua or Josue__19.18: And his inheritance was Jezrael and Casaloth and Sunem,
Joshua or Josue__19.19: And Hapharaim and Seen and Anaharath,
Joshua or Josue__19.21: And Rameth and Engannim and Enhadda and Bethpheses.
Joshua or Josue__19.22: And the border thereof cometh to Thabor and Sehesima and Bethsames: and the outgoings thereof shall be at the Jordan: sixteen cities, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.23: This is the possession of the sons of Issachar by their kindreds, the cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.24: And the fifth lot fell to the tribe of the children of Aser by their kindreds:
Joshua or Josue__19.25: And their border was Halcath and Chali and Beten and Axaph,
Joshua or Josue__19.26: And Elmelech and Amaad and Messal: and it reacheth to Carmel by the sea and Sihor and Labanath,
Joshua or Josue__19.27: And it returneth towards the east to Bethdagon: and passeth along to Zabulon and to the valley of Jephthael towards the north to Bethemec and Nehiel. And it goeth out to the left side of Cabul,
Joshua or Josue__19.28: And to Abaran and Rohob and Hamon and Cana, as far as the great Sidon.
Joshua or Josue__19.29: And it returneth to Horma to the strong city of Tyre, and to Hosa: and the outgoings thereof shall be at the sea from the portion of Achziba:
Joshua or Josue__19.30: And Amma and Aphec and Rohob: twenty-two cities, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.31: This is the possession of the children of Aser by their kindreds, and the cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.32: The sixth lot came out to the sons of Nephtali by their families:
Joshua or Josue__19.33: And the border began from Heleph and Elon to Saananim, and Adami, which is Neceb, and Jebnael even to Lecum: and their outgoings unto the Jordan:
Joshua or Josue__19.34: And the border returneth westward to Azanotthabor, and goeth out from thence to Hucuca, and passeth along to Zabulon southward, and to Aser westward, and to Juda upon the Jordan towards the rising of the sun.
Joshua or Josue__19.35: And the strong cities are Assedim, Ser, and Emath, and Reccath and Cenereth,
Joshua or Josue__19.38: And Jeron and Magdalel, Herem, and Bethanath and Bethsames: nineteen cities, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.39: This is the possession of the tribe of the children of Nephtali by their kindreds, the cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.40: The seventh lot came out to the tribe of the children of Dan by their families:
Joshua or Josue__19.41: And the border of their possession was Saraa and Esthaol, and Hirsemes, that is, the city of the sun.
Joshua or Josue__19.45: And Jud and Bane and Barach and Gethremmon:
Joshua or Josue__19.46: And Mejarcon and Arecon, with the border that looketh towards Joppe,
Joshua or Josue__19.47: And is terminated there. And the children of Dan went up and fought against Lesem, and took it: and they put it to the sword, and possessed it, and dwelt in it, calling the name of it Lesem Dan, by the name of Dan their father.
Joshua or Josue__19.48: This is the possession of the tribe of the sons of Dan, by their kindreds, the cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__19.49: And when he had made an end of dividing the land by lot to each one by their tribes, the children of Israel gave a possession to Josue the son of Nun in the midst of them,
Joshua or Josue__19.50: According to the commandment of the Lord, the city which he asked for, Thamnath Saraa, in mount Ephraim: and he built up the city, and dwelt in it.
Joshua or Josue__19.51: These are the possessions which Eleazar the priest, and Josue the son of Nun, and the princes of the families, and of the tribes of the children of Israel, distributed by lot in Silo, before the Lord at the door of the tabernacle of the testimony, and they divided the land.
